qwen_objects_raw:
system
You are a visual object inventory tool. Only list objects that are clearly visible and important for a short and high-level image captioning. Return JSON with key 'objects' as a list of strings. Do not add any other keys. Do not describe the scene. Do not describe actions.
user
List up to 20 visible objects. Return only JSON.
assistant
["soda bottles", "soda cans", "labels", "bottles", "cans", "soda", "bottles and cans", "soda bottles and cans", "bottles and soda", "cans and soda", "bottles and soda cans", "soda bottles and soda cans", "bottles and soda bottles", "cans and soda bottles", "bottles and soda bottles and cans", "soda bottles and soda bottles and cans", "bottles and soda bottles and soda cans", "cans and soda bottles and soda cans", "bottles and soda bottles and soda cans and labels"]
